title: Easy Integration
details: Runs on talech, our robust payment processing software, which provides dozens of added features, analytics and more.

title: Keep going
details: High-powered lithium battery for longer charge. Pair with optional docking station for more connection ports.

title: Wireless freedom
details: Looks great on the counter or on-the-go. Full WiFi, 4G and Bluetooth transaction support.

title: Data protection
details: Embedded Safe-T security solution adds encryption and tokenization to protect card payment data.

title: Dedicated support
details: Full 24/7 email and phone assistance with answering technical and account questions.

title: Payment flexibility
details: Accepts swipe and chip cards, contactless, gift cards and QR. At the counter, at the table, or anywhere.

title: On display
details: Crisp 5‚Äù LCD touchscreen, embedded camera and adjustable backlight make navigation a breeze.
